links.quantification: Skilled masons → proper insulation/sealing → 20% operational energy reduction in informal construction (60% of stock)
Better construction quality → durability +30% → housing lifespan 25→35 years → community asset preservation
Formalization pathway: Training → certification → higher wages (₹500→₹800/day) → skilled labor market development
Informal sector resistance: 60% of construction unregulated → training threatens low-cost model → compliance avoidance
Training → better homes → community pride → demand for quality → skill premium increases (reinforcing)
Requires certification system: Training only effective with recognized credentials + job market acceptance → ITI/NSDC integration needed
Via efficiency: 20% operational savings → reduced fossil energy → emissions decline
Via demand: Community quality standards → formal mason demand → industry professionalization
